ppe_requirements.respiratory: Full-face pressure-demand SCBA or supplied-air respirator for >0.1 ppm. Air-purifying respirator with organic vapor cartridge acceptable for ≤0.1 ppm with escape provisions.
ppe_requirements.skin: Nitrile or butyl rubber gloves, chemical-resistant suit. Acrolein causes severe skin burns - minimize exposure.
ppe_requirements.eye: Chemical safety goggles, full face shield. Extremely irritating to eyes.
ppe_requirements.minimum_level: Level B minimum for any concentration >0.1 ppm or unknown concentrations
ppe_requirements.special_notes: EXTREMELY IRRITATING at sub-ppm levels. Eye and respiratory irritation immediate. Lachrymator (tear gas properties). Self-rescue respirators may be inadequate - use supplied air.

physical_properties.odor: Pungent, acrid, disagreeable odor - IMMEDIATE WARNING at 0.1 ppm

emergency_response.fire_hazard: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE. Wide explosive range. Vapors heavier than air - travel to ignition sources. May polymerize in fire, releasing toxic gases.
emergency_response.fire_suppression: EVACUATE - extremely toxic fumes. Use unmanned equipment. Dry chemical, CO2, alcohol-resistant foam. Water spray to cool containers from safe distance. Do not use water directly on liquid.
emergency_response.spill_procedures: EVACUATE IMMEDIATELY. Extremely hazardous. SCBA MANDATORY. Eliminate ignition sources. Ventilate area. Contain with sand/earth. Neutralize with sodium bisulfite solution. Absorb with inert material. Dispose as hazardous waste.
emergency_response.exposure_immediate_actions: Remove to fresh air immediately. Severe eye/respiratory irritation likely. Flush eyes with water for 15+ minutes. Remove contaminated clothing. Wash skin thoroughly. Seek medical attention immediately - potential for delayed pulmonary edema.
emergency_response.environmental_hazards: Toxic to aquatic life. Volatilizes rapidly from water. Report spills >1 lb. Keep out of waterways.
emergency_response.special_hazards: EXTREMELY TOXIC AND IRRITATING. Lachrymator - causes immediate tearing. Severe respiratory irritant - can cause pulmonary edema (delayed 24-48 hours). Polymerizes violently when contaminated. Suspected carcinogen. Fire produces deadly acrolein and formaldehyde.

storage_requirements.temperature_range: Store below 25°C, refrigerate if possible. Keep away from heat.
storage_requirements.ventilation: Outdoor storage preferred. Indoor: explosion-proof ventilation with emergency backup. Gas detection mandatory.
storage_requirements.container_material: Stainless steel or glass with PTFE seals. Stabilized with hydroquinone. Never use copper or brass.
storage_requirements.segregation: Isolate from all other chemicals. Separate from oxidizers by 20 feet. Flammable storage cabinet.
storage_requirements.quantity_limits: Minimize on-site quantities. Many facilities limit to <10 gallons.
storage_requirements.special_requirements: CRITICAL: Store with stabilizer (hydroquinone 0.1-0.25%). Check stabilizer regularly. Gas detection system MANDATORY. Keep refrigerated. Store away from light. Emergency eyewash/shower within 10 seconds. Post "EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE" and "POISON" signs.

reactivity.stability: UNSTABLE. Polymerizes readily, especially when contaminated or exposed to light, heat, acids, or bases. MUST be stabilized.
reactivity.polymerization: Violent exothermic polymerization possible. Stabilizer (hydroquinone) required. Check stabilizer level before handling.
reactivity.reactivity_hazard: EXTREMELY REACTIVE. Polymerizes violently. Reacts violently with oxidizers. Strong reducing agent. Corrosive. May explode in fire.

environmental_impact.aquatic_toxicity: Very toxic to aquatic life. LC50 (fish, 96h): 0.09-0.28 mg/L. Toxic at parts-per-million levels.
environmental_impact.biodegradability: Readily biodegradable (>70% in 28 days). Oxidizes to acrylic acid and CO2.
environmental_impact.bioaccumulation: Low bioaccumulation. Log Kow: 0.01. Does not accumulate.
environmental_impact.soil_mobility: High mobility. Volatilizes rapidly from soil. Does not adsorb.
environmental_impact.atmospheric_fate: Photolyzes rapidly via hydroxyl radicals. Atmospheric half-life: 7-20 hours. Contributes to ozone formation.

reportable_releases.water: 1 lb to navigable waters - IMMEDIATELY reportable

detection_monitoring.odor_threshold: 0.16-1.0 ppm - provides warning BUT overlaps toxic range. DO NOT rely on odor alone.
